about_the_game:
Enjoy the spine-tingling sounds of DEVOUR with the official soundtrack composed by Steve Brooks and Peter Fender. After a hard day banishing demons, sometimes you just want to sit back and let the soothing sounds of mortal terror wash over you as you dream up new strategies for beating Azazel and his minions.

Immerse yourself in the world of DEVOUR once again by returning to each terrifying location: The DEVOUR Soundtrack includes 35 tracks - that's every single chilling ambient track from our currently released maps, as well as the full music track for each map's menu.
